documentation.text: @notice Provides addresses for all modules in Opyn v2
@notice Provides addresses for all modules in Opyn v2

params._OpynV2AddressBook: The address of the AddressBook contract on the current network

getOpynV2Controller().details: Opyn v2 uses proxies to deploy upgradable contracts and this is why we can not return OpynV2AddressBook.getController() directly

returns._0: Address of the current Controller implementation contract

OpynV2AddressBook().notice: Provides addresses for all modules in Opyn v2

constructor.notice: Create a new contract that provides the Opyn v2 helper functions

getOpynV2Controller().notice: Get the address of the contract that controls the Gamma Protocol (Opyn v2) and the interaction of all sub contracts in the current network

userdoc.notice: Helper functions to easily interact with the Opyn v2 margin protocol
